thread.title: Numerous Northern Texas Properties to be Sold to Highest Bidder(s)
thread.title_full: Numerous Northern Texas Properties to be Sold to Highest Bidder(s)

author: Angela Smith
title: Numerous Northern Texas Properties to be Sold to Highest Bidder(s)
text:
Buyers have the opportunity of a lifetime to bid on a diverse offering of Wilbarger County and Wichita Falls County properties. United Country – Strategic Client Services, in association with United Country – AB Cole & Associates Auction and Realty, will offer a variety of farms, ranches, residential and commercial properties to the highest bidders during a live and online auction on Thursday, November 5. “We believe that multi-property events are one of the best ways to bring properties to the public,” said Mike Jones, broker and auctioneer with United Country – Strategic Client Services. “This format allows qualified buyers the opportunity to see and purchase a variety of available farms, ranches, residential homes and commercial properties and at current fair market values through the bidding process.”
All properties for sale are being offered on behalf of a single charitable trust foundation. Properties for sale include over 27 farms, ranches, residential and commercial properties in and around Vernon, Texas. The auction will take place at the Wilbarger County Exhibit Building, 2215 Harrold St., Vernon, Texas. Online bids will also be accepted. Bidders can preview the properties on Saturday, October 24, or October 31.
Detailed information about the tracts, as well as further information about the auction, can be found online at TXRealEstateAuction.com or by calling 877-539-9866.
About United Country Real Estate
United Country Real Estate – a division of the United Real Estate Group – is the leading, fully integrated network of conventional and auction real estate professionals. The company has been an innovator in lifestyle and country real estate marketing since 1925. United Country supports more than 500 offices and 5,000 real estate professionals across four continents, with a unique, comprehensive marketing program. The exclusive program includes the highest ranked and largest portfolios of specialty property marketing websites, unequaled national print advertising, the largest internal real estate advertising agency, an extensive buyer database of more than 550,000 opt-in buyers and additional proprietary programs to advertise properties more broadly.
